To elaborate on what Mr. Cooper said, a social class and in this day in 
ag=
e, profession does not determine whether people are heroes or 
villains. Lo=
ok at it this way. A lawyer can be seen as a hero by his 
client and as a v=
illain as the plaintiff. It's a matter of perspective, 
and where this pers=
on stands in your life.
